expectations.name: valid_orderkey
expectations.expression: order_id IS NOT NULL AND order_id > 0

expectations.name: valid_partkey
expectations.expression: part_id IS NOT NULL AND part_id > 0

expectations.name: valid_suppkey
expectations.expression: supplier_id IS NOT NULL AND supplier_id > 0

expectations.name: valid_linenumber
expectations.expression: line_number IS NOT NULL AND line_number > 0

expectations.name: valid_quantity
expectations.expression: quantity IS NOT NULL AND quantity > 0

expectations.name: valid_extendedprice
expectations.expression: extendedprice IS NOT NULL AND extendedprice > 0

expectations.name: valid_discount
expectations.expression: discount IS NOT NULL AND discount > 0

expectations.name: valid_tax
expectations.expression: tax IS NOT NULL AND tax > 0

expectations.name: valid_returnflag
expectations.expression: return_flag IS NULL OR return_flag IN ('R', 'N')

expectations.name: valid_linestatus
expectations.expression: line_status IS NULL OR line_status IN ('F', 'O')

expectations.name: valid_shipdate
expectations.expression: (ship_date IS NOT NULL AND ship_date >= '1900-01-01') or ship_date is null

expectations.name: valid_commitdate
expectations.expression: commit_date IS NOT NULL AND commit_date >= '1900-01-01'

expectations.name: valid_receiptdate
expectations.expression: (receipt_date IS NOT NULL AND receipt_date >= '1900-01-01') or receipt_date is null

expectations.name: valid_shipmode
expectations.expression: ship_mode IS NOT NULL AND ship_mode IN ('RAIL','REG AIR','TRUCK','MAIL','SHIP','FOB')
